gift: Wealthiest philantrophist in the world. $200-million for vaccines.
title: Co-founder and Chairman of Microsoft
name: Bill Gates

title: Investor and businessman. Chairman and CEO of Berkshire Hathaway
name: Warren Buffett

gift: Promises to give at least half his wealth in "the Giving Pledge"
title: Businessman. Co-founder and CEO of Oracle.
name: Larry Ellison

gift: Given $120 thousand to the Smithsonian's Astrophysical Observatory
title: Businessman. Chairman and CEO of Koch Industries
notes: Koch money is based on individual donations. Does not include spouses. Does include PAC (ex: KochPAC $)
name: Charles G. Koch

gift: Pledged to give $100 million to New York City Center Theatre.
title: Businessman. Executive vice president of Koch Industries.
name: David H. Koch

gift: $4 million to International Community Foundation, fostering health, education and environment grants in Mexico and Latin America.
title: One of the heirs to the Walton (Walmart) family fortune
name: Christy Walton

title: Financier and investor. Chairman of Soros
name: George Soros

title: Las Vegas casino magnate, Las Vegas Sands Corporation
name: Sheldon Adelson

gift: Though it can't be directly attributed to Jim Walton, the Walton Family Foundation gave $20.99 million to Conservation International.
title: Chairman of Arvest Bank, one of the heirs to the Walton (Walmart) family fortune
name: Jim Walton

gift: Crystal Bridges American Art Museum - $1.2 billion donation from the Walton family and Walton Family Foundation
title: One of the heirs to the Walton (Walmart) family fortune
